timeline.bodyText: Same comment about provider not being a java provider?
timeline.author: bogdandrutu

revised_code.chunk: diff --git a/api/src/main/java/io/opentelemetry/trace/TracerProvider.java b/api/src/main/java/io/opentelemetry/trace/TracerProvider.java index 2fe570639..0b3e126bb 100644 --- a/api/src/main/java/io/opentelemetry/trace/TracerProvider.java +++ b/api/src/main/java/io/opentelemetry/trace/TracerProvider.java @@ -20,6 +20,8 @@ import javax.annotation.concurrent.ThreadSafe; /** * A registry for creating named {@link Tracer}s. + * Although the class is provided at runtime via {@link io.opentelemetry.trace.spi.TraceProvider}, + * the name Provider is for consistency with other languages. * * @see io.opentelemetry.OpenTelemetry * @see io.opentelemetry.trace.Tracer

timeline.message: Add comment to address the provider name
